explains: v. 期待；预计；要求，指望；认为；怀孕
wordGroup: expect too much of 对(某人)期望过高
expect to do 期待去做；期望做某事

sentences.en: Women expect fidelity from their men.
sentences.cn: 女人期望来自她们男人的忠贞。

sentences.en: Don't expect it to improve overnight.
sentences.cn: 不要指望这事一下子就改善了。

sentences.en: Don't expect others to read your mind.
sentences.cn: 不要期望别人能看出你的心思。
